text: Tanging Yaman (International Title: A Change of Heart) is a 2000 Filipino family drama movie directed by Laurice Guillen and starring Gloria Romero, Dina Bonnevie, Edu Manzano, Johnny Delgado, Joel Torre, Marvin Agustin, Hilda Koronel. It was distributed by Star Cinema. ==Other websites== * Category:2000 drama movies Category:2000s family movies Category:Filipino movies Category:Movies directed by Laurice Guillen Category:Movies about families Category:Movies set in the Philippines
title: Tanging Yaman
